name: Pile Up (itch)
description:
BitBot the Robot is trapped in the junkyard...and he has no body!  BitBot can't move without help, but he can communicate wirelessly with other bots in the junkyard.  

Available bots are indicated by a hovering button. Press that button on your keyboard to activate the bot!

Solve puzzles, avoid traps, and guide BitBot to the green exit light in every level. Only BitBot can fit through the exit door, so he'll have to leave his friends behind. Don't worry--new friends are waiting on the next level!

Pile Up was created for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam by:

  • Programming: @DrakesGames (DrakesGames.com), Kybe
  • Level Design: Kybe, @DrakesGames, @Dale_Bashir
  • Pixelart: @SUSpixelart, @Sininenblue
  • Cover: @SUSpixelart
  • Music: @Joshryanml
  • Sound/Voices: @shepski (adriansounds.com)

And stay tuned for v2.0, where you'll meet:

Propeller guy

Legs

Toaster friend

Grapplehook guy

Fire trap guy

Friendly Piston
